item.title: 截屏工具 FastStone Capture 支持「固定到屏幕」和「文本提取」
item.description:
软餐获悉，备受欢迎的 Windows 截屏工具 FastStone Capture 于 2024 年 5 月底发布了最新版本，即 FastStone Capture 10.5（官网下载页）。新版本新增了 「固定到屏幕」 和 「捕获文本」 功能。

顾名思义，「固定到屏幕」（界面上译为 「屏幕贴图」）允许用户将截屏固定在电脑屏幕上，以便在不同的应用程序之间切换。「捕获文本」 则允许用户直接从屏幕截图中提取文本。

  • 添加了 「固定到屏幕」。此功能允许您在其他窗口（如便笺）上固定和注释屏幕截图。优势包括：
    • 参考便利性：如果您正在处理一项需要您经常参考屏幕截图的任务，将其固定在屏幕上可以使您免于不断切换窗口或应用程序。
    • 高效比较：当您需要比较应用程序之间的数据时，固定屏幕截图可以更轻松地同时查看两组数据，而无需第二台显示器。
    • 视觉提醒：固定捕获可以作为需要完成的任务或需要注意的信息的视觉提醒，从而减少忘记重要细节的机会。
  • 添加了 「捕获文本」。此功能可以提取文本并使其可立即编辑，从而节省时间和精力，而不是从屏幕截图中手动键入文本。它需要 Windows 10/11。
  • 进行了其他改进和错误修复

The popular Windows screenshot tool, FastStone Capture, released its latest version, FastStone Capture 10.5, at the end of May 2024. The new version introduces the 「Pin to Screen」 and 「Capture Text」 features.

As the name suggests, the 「Pin to Screen」 (translated as 「Screen Magnifier」 in the interface) allows users to pin the screenshot to their computer screen for easy switching between different applications. The 「Capture Text」 feature enables users to extract text directly from the screen captures.

  • Enhanced Screen Recorder:
    • Simplified the Start Recording window. Switch between simplified mode and detailed mode with just a single click
    • Enable/disable devices like Microphone, Speaker, and Webcam directly within the Start Recording window
  • Enhanced Eraser in Draw tool:
    • Show a circular cursor to indicate the area to be erased.
    • Right click mouse to pick a screen color
    • Scroll mouse wheel to adjust eraser size
  • Enhanced the Save dialog in the Scan tool with improved functionality and user interface.
  • Added 「Save All (same name)」 option (Ctrl+Alt+S) to the File menu in FastStone Editor, allowing you to save multiple images with the same name and a sequential number
  • Many other small enhancements and bug fixes

item.description:

item.title: 遥测功能降低了 Firefox 安卓版的性能
item.description:
遥测功能似乎影响了 Firefox 安卓版的性能，Mozilla 已对此展开调查。根据初步报告，遥测会增加额外的 CPU 时间。其中一项测试显示，在加载 CNN 网站时，遥测使 Firefox 安卓版增加了额外的 16.5 秒 CPU 时间。此外，浏览器的启动也受到遥测的影响——与关闭遥测相比，启动浏览器会增加 40% 的 CPU 时间。Mozilla 表示，问题的根源在于 Android 上的遥测更新没有进行分组，因此每次更新都会单独添加到数据库中。此外，每次更新都会将整个数据库写入磁盘。由于遥测数据被广泛收集，因此会执行大量的写操作。这会对浏览器的启动、网页加载和媒体播放等方面产生影响。在 Mozilla 改进之前，Android 用户可以选择在浏览器中关闭遥测以获得更好的性能。关闭方法

The telemetry feature of Firefox for Android appears to be impacting the performance of the browser, and Mozilla has initiated an investigation into this matter. According to preliminary reports, telemetry adds additional CPU time. One test showed that while loading the CNN website, telemetry added an extra 16.5 seconds of CPU time to Firefox for Android. Additionally, the startup of the browser is also affected by telemetry, with a 40% increase in CPU time compared to when telemetry is disabled. Mozilla states that the root cause of the issue lies in the fact that telemetry updates on Android are not grouped, leading to individual additions to the database with each update. Furthermore, every update requires writing the entire database to disk. Since telemetry data is collected extensively, it results in a significant number of write operations. This has an impact on browser startup, webpage loading, and media playback. Until Mozilla addresses the issue, Android users can choose to disable telemetry in the browser for improved performance.

item.title: Netflix 宣布将推出《我的世界》动画剧集
item.description:
Netflix 宣布将推出一部围绕视频游戏 Minecraft（我的世界）的动画剧集。这家流媒体平台提到了一个 「带有全新角色的原创故事」。发布日期尚未公布。已释出的预告片展示了下界与爬行者的地下世界。这部剧集由加拿大工作室 WildBrain Studios 制作，该机构曾为 Netflix 制作过几部儿童剧集和《Sonic Prime》。此外，还有一部 Minecraft 主题电影正在开发中，杰克·布莱克（Jack Black）可能会扮演主角。

Netflix has announced the upcoming release of an animated series based on the video game Minecraft. The streaming platform mentions an 「original story with new characters.」 The release date has not been revealed yet. The teaser trailer showcases the Nether, an underground world, and a Creeper. There is no indication of the plot at this time. The animated series is being produced by Canadian studio WildBrain Studios, known for creating several children’s series and 「Sonic Prime」 for Netflix. Additionally, there is an ongoing development of a Minecraft-themed film, with actor Jack Black rumored to have a leading role.
